channel.title: How do you make a client into a .jar file?
channel.description:
how do i make my client into a simple .jar file that allows me to run the client when i click the .jar file?
is there i code i can put in my compiler or something (im a good coder so i know how to do it)
or do i need a program or something?
Thanks

item.title: How do you make a client into a .jar file?

item.description:

life is cruel:

im a good coder so i know how to do it

Why ask, then?

  4. Learn English.
